arts.ttl: "I just don't want to complain too much" - all reactions to Bayern's 3-1 win over Augsburg
arts.sum: Here are some notable reactions from players and coaches after Bayern Munich's 3-1 victory over Augsburg.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich overcome stubborn Augsburg to maintain title charge
arts.sum: The away side the game with a six-point lead at the top of the Bundesliga, while Augsburg were riding high on an impressive 11-match unbeaten streak, during which they had conceded only three goals. Leroy Sané, a constant threat throughout the match, takes on an Augsburg defender in a one-on-one situation.

arts.ttl: Kane scores in Bayern win over Augsburg as march towards Bundesliga title continues
arts.sum: Bundesliga leader Bayern Munich came from behind to beat in-form Augsburg 3-1 on Friday and Harry Kane’s second-half goal helped it extend its lead to nine points. Augsburg came into the match unbeaten in its last 11 games and it took the lead thanks to a bit of quick thinking after half an hour.
A Bavarian derby to kick off Matchday 28, with league leaders Bayern Munich travelling to an Augsburg side who were on the rise. Bayern struggled, and that is more of…

arts.ttl: Bayern wonderkid in the squad selection against Augsburg
arts.sum: Bayern Munich's injury problems resulted in top talent Lennart Karl getting into the matchday 28 squad.

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: FC Augsburg vs. Bayern Munich
arts.sum: The lineups for the Friday night clash between Augsburg and Bayern Munich have been announced. How is the Bundesliga matchday 28 going to kick off?

arts.ttl: Throwback: The last time Augsburg beat Bayern Munich
arts.sum: Let's look back at how Augsburg lined up in their last victory over der Rekordmeister in 2022/23!

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs. Bayern München preview: League leaders face tough test
arts.sum: Bundesliga leaders Bayern München are set for a tough test as they make the relatively short trip to face an Augsburg side unbeaten in 11
